welcome.intro: Minimalist-minded planning for all goals, small and large.

goalsConfirm.question: Are there any other goals you'd like to add?
goalsConfirm.additionalText: (If you'd like to edit any existing goals, let's do that too.)

error.atLeastOne: You must add at least one goal.
error.tooMany: Currently you can only add up to 6 goals, more will be available later.

timeSpentCard.question: How do you spend most of your time?

timeSpentConfirm.question: Are there any other time spenders you'd like to add?
timeSpentConfirm.additionalText: (If you'd like to edit any existing time spenders, let's do that too.)

error.atLeastOne: You must add at least one time spender.
error.tooMany: Currently you can only add up to 10 time spenders, more will be available later.

timeSpentAllocate.question: When are you doing these activities?
